snippet.title: Off The Grid – Official Gameplay Trailer | 4K | Unreal Engine 5 Battle Royale
snippet.description:
Gear up for Off The Grid, a AAA free-to-play cyberpunk battle royale – coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and PC in 2024.

⭐️ Playtest Off The Grid: https://otg.gg/YTPioneers

Off The Grid throws players into a covert corporate war between three gaming companies on the tropical dystopia of Teardrop Island. Blending PvE and PvP like never before, as a cyberlimbed Zero, you’ll experience hectic 150-player battle royales, fighting to survive while simultaneously immersing yourself in an incredible 60-hour narrative campaign.

Off The Grid allows for in-session modifications where players can equip their characters with unique abilities by fitting cybernetic limbs, equipping different weapons, and weapon attachments giving an entirely new meaning to 'adaptive gameplay.'  

----- 

Enjoyed the gameplay? Check out our other video: https://www.youtube.com/@playoffthegrid  

Remember to subscribe to our channel to be notified when the next video comes out!  

----- 

Follow Off The Grid’s social media channels: 
👉 Discord: https://discord.gg/offthegrid
👉 Website: https://playoffthegrid.com
👉 Twitter: https://twitter.com/playoffthegrid  
👉 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playoffthegrid/  
👉 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlayOffTheGrid/  
👉 TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@playoffthegrid
 
#OffTheGrid #BattleRoyale #Cyberpunk #UnrealEngine5 #Gameplay #NeillBlomkamp
